Article.ArticleTitle: Molecular farming for the food sector.

Abstract.AbstractText: Molecular farming, initially developed to produce therapeutic proteins using genetically modified plants, gained renewed interest during the Ebola and COVID-19 outbreaks and has expanded into functional food ingredients. This article evaluates molecular farming technologies, market potential, and startups, and identifies opportunities in dairy proteins, food enzymes, collagen, and cellular agriculture.
